events.text: Huh. Some sort of magical-looking mushroom here.

So, here's the thing.
Mushrooms are not treasure.
You should keep going.
I'm getting pretty hungry out here, Ananna.

So your plan is to just eat a random mushroom that "looks magical"?
I mean, you realize that plan is stupid, right?

Lemingway?
...
...You're eating the mushroom, aren't you?

...
You were right. This was a bad idea.
This mushroom was not magical.
This mushroom was evil.
My stomach is trying to escape from my body.
